about_the_game:
MOTH PLANET is a kinetic, bouncy 2D platformer, where you interview moths scattered across an interconnected world as you investigate its secrets and get the biggest scoop!

You play as Robin, a journalist for the MOTH PLANET - Lepidopteros’ most scandalous investigative newspaper!

After mysterious ruins were discovered in the distant village of Lycosina, your editor sent you on a mission: go there and find out what happened, and see if there’s any truth to the locals’ claims. You are, after all, a serious journalist.





Robin is a diligent professional. They are quick on their feet, agile and resistant to most forms of damage! They are also extremely bouncy, like a rubber ball!



Accelerate very quickly, and fly through hazards and obstacles as you make your way through Lycosina!



Your camera is the single most valuable asset in your investigation!



Snap pictures of the moths you find across Lycosina and its surroundings to take their statements! They will always have something to say, be it anecdotes from their life so far from civilization, first-hand accounts of the recent events which shook the region, or even clues to the truth behind the mysterious ruins.

Your camera’s flash is so powerful it is even able to activate switches, reveal secrets, and more!



It is your job to interview as many moths as you can, and get the full story of what happened!





Explore four visually distinct, interconnected regions, full of dangers and secrets as you make your journey to these fabled “ruins”, to see what is the truth of these rumors!

Each region has its own hazards exclusive to them, such as the aggressive Stalker Plants in the Forest, or the toxic Mushroom Spores in the Caves.





MOTH PLANET features a SPEEDRUN MODE, featuring two options:

  • ANY%
For those who want to reach the ending as fast as possible, with as minimum interviews as possible!

  • 100%
For the completionists! Interview every moth in the game, find every secret, and reach the end as fast as you can!





Lepidopteros is a world full of secrets, and its forgotten history is now coming to light. Will you be able to discover the truth, and write up that world-shattering news article?

Jump, fly and bounce your way through this moth-filled world, and find out what secrets lie… in MOTH PLANET.
detailed_description:
Demo Version Features!

In the Demo, you’ll be able to get a taste of the beginning of the game - Robin’s arrival at the distant village of Lycosina, and will also be able to explore the surrounding Forest, find the first two Landmarks, and secrets!

Also in this demo: SPEEDRUN MODE! Featuring 100% and Any% conditions!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300, x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri), Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600, x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0), Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
